thread.section_title: BGASC.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BGASC.com | www.bgasc.com
thread.title: Martin

author: Martin
title: Martin
text: As a first time user, the site did not have any of my information. So, during checkout, I exceeded the ten minute time limit. Almost done!! Nope, I got kicked back to the beginning. As someone experienced with trading metals, I certainly understand the need for refreshing prices. Overall, the prices are fair market, the site is easily negotiable, and there is a wide variety of product available. Other than what I will count as an operator error, I am completely satisfied with services rendered.
